TopicTitle: How do you use spoiler tags?

Articles.Content: How do you use spoiler tags? Because, well, spoilers. (Shows image of River Song)

[noparse]

> 
> TARDIS Blue.

[/noparse]

Gives

> 
> TARDIS Blue.

EDIT:

So basically:

[noparse]

> 
> <spoiler content=""></spoiler>

[/noparse]
Aye. As Starwhip has demonstrated, you need to include a title along with the tag for it to properly format.

> 
> [noparse]
> Gives
